channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1467658817982943234
item.description: #COVID19mx El informe técnico diario de la @SSalud_mx reporta un total de 295,202 muertes confirmadas pero al analizar sus propios datos abiertos son en realidad 295,203. Ni con sus propios datos pueden ser congruentes🙄 https://t.co/PuRuEPnfg8

item.title: #en @ 1467629122872619010
item.description:
Some people in the comments understood my tweet as a complaint. I'm not complaining at all!
I'm all for open data.
It is great if others find ways to make our work more valuable for the world.

item.title: #en @ 1467569918694539268
item.description: @statsgeekclare @chrischirp @thomasforth @bothness Pretty much. And they were absolutely content with the ArcGIS one and the 4 metrics. No one wanted open data or open source. Some people were actively opposed to it at first before they saw the benefits.

item.title: #en @ 1467537544170463232
item.description: We are now less likely to be caught unawares by emerging variants, but blind spots still exist. We can only see & manage what is sequenced, equity of access to sequencing around the world is essential, along with rapid & open data sharing. @FaceTheNation https://t.co/h06LNj1kVL

item.title: #en @ 1467531835085307907
item.description: December 1st was LHC World Wide Data Day organized by @IppogOrg in which high-school students globally got opportunity to analyze #opendata from LHC including CMS data and share results with physics moderators!🌎💻 Photos show participants from Bulgaria, Indiana & Italy🌐 https://t.co/MP8p0Ro9ni

item.description:
This year’s State of Open Data report includes a piece from @4TUResearchData’s @ConnieEClare documenting a day in the life of their data curator, Jan van der Heul, including the steps, challenges, and rewards of the data review process.
Read the report: https://t.co/SNtspeanyX https://t.co/h89GdeGcWn

item.title: #fr @ 1467417209274253313
item.description:
Aux derniers chiffres en open data, 9,2 millions d'habitants ont désormais reçu une dose de rappel, dont 6,4 millions âgés d'au moins 65 ans (courbe rouge). C'est 62% de ceux vaccinés il y a 5 mois.
2/3 https://t.co/ru2PS9myZV https://t.co/5M2g7EisRz

item.title: #en @ 1467235870323343364
item.description: At #ML4H2021, @m_sendhil discusses the goal of creating more open data through Nightingale Open Science, which will be launched December 2021. They will be hosting a #NeurIPS2021 workshop: https://t.co/hHk2lbh7rg I'm excited to be giving a spotlight talk on dermatology datasets.

item.title: #fr @ 1467196948952363014
item.description: @JusquMer Non, comme l'a déjà fait remarquer @Terrasses_75 les arrêtés d'autorisation et de refus ne sont ni publiés (malgré l'obligation légale) ni répertoriés sur l'open data. La transparence fait cruellement défaut en ce qui concerne ces autorisations...

item.title: #ja @ 1467111439307780096
item.description: 個人的に注目してた数値に到達しました！ 厚生労働省が昨年ゴールデンウィーク明けに発表し始めた「新型コロナウイルス感染症重症者数」では、 2020年7月9日時点の重症者数が31人で最少だったのですが、 2021年12月3日時点（本日発表分）の重症者数が28人となり最少を更新。 https://t.co/G11Pg27nd4

item.title: #de @ 1467075197844996096
item.description: Ich wünschte, öffentliche Einrichtungen würden offene Schnittstellen und freie Daten bereitstellen, nicht weil sie es müssen, sondern weil sie es wollen und den Sinn und den Mehrwert, sogar für sich selbst, erkennen. #opendata #opensource #openaccess https://t.co/ZF9NI88488

item.title: #fr @ 1467030691200258052
item.description: Mobilités : on avance ! Les chiffres qui objectivent le débat sont issus de données publiques. Ils sont émis par la Métropole et non la ville de Bordeaux. Les points de comptage, les matériels utilisés sont les mêmes que ceux présents avant notre arrivée. https://t.co/uLHreiShDQ

item.title: #en @ 1466968172406345730
item.description:
Ignore the mask issue. Just come for the statistics and trial design matters.
Also … #OpenData is core to the debate.
Notable too is that studies that share their raw data deserve respect. https://t.co/Jp7UB5jSo3

item.description: #COVID19mx Regresan los errores al comunicado técnico diario, porque según los propios datos abiertos de la @SSalud_mx son 294,904 defunciones confirmadas, y no 294,903 (les falta 1). https://t.co/89G4n9FkfO

item.description:

item.title: #en @ 1466839781686398977
item.description: The lack of coherent and cohesive open data about published scientific works is a painful thorn; a reminder that, until resolved, most science is a lossy facsimile of its ideal form.

item.title: #nl @ 1466815241606471681
item.description:
Er zijn nú 7.2 miljoen mensen die een Booster mogen ontvangen. 0,5 miljoen mensen hebben, waarschijnlijk (want geen open data, want RIVM🤬), een boostershot gekregen.
In het scenario 'gelijk beginnen' waren er nu 1.6 miljoen prikken gezet. In het scenario 'vol gas': 2.6 miljoen https://t.co/4O2JWkSvz4

item.title: #en @ 1466812862182088708
item.description:
In #Uganda, the reception of #SautiUg is positive from the government. It has helped to inform them of the citizens' awareness of #COVID19.
If I compare that to #Tanzania, we still have a long way to go to get to where we were on open data - @rishachande #DataTamasha2021 https://t.co/nC6p2u6qDa

item.title: #en @ 1466775543978901508
item.description: Vaccination rates for gov employees should be #opendata, particularly for public-facing positions like the MTA PD. Good reporting from @kduggan16 to get the rate for MTA PD: 60%, the lowest within the MTA workforce. @BetaNYC @RidersAlliance @PCACriders https://t.co/2kXTfZJCtn

item.description:

item.title: #en @ 1466765057908428800
item.description: Looking forward to this important discussion on how we can build and use digital tools to serve public health, while prioritising strengthening capacity in countries and open data sharing, which will hopefully lead to better decisions. https://t.co/s9qhUVTUS7

item.title: #fr @ 1466761728084135944
item.description: #COVID19 Avec les données mise en #opendata par la #Drees on peut estimer l'efficacité vaccinale sur le risque d'être positif symptomatique. Cette efficacité est forte au départ, diminue à distance du vaccin, mais réaugmente nettement suite au rappel. https://t.co/D2lqRrhHSj https://t.co/Xx9aW3ppHd

item.description: @audreyt @johnnyryan @Andreas_Schwab @TomValletti @louisa_specht @Caffar3Cristina @BMWi_Bund @winfriedveil @ElineCMC @WieseSvanberg @PKuzev @DS_Stiftung @EU_opendata @AdeMontchalin @cio_bund @BMI_Bund @OpenData_EU @darley_KAS @francesca_bria @AxelVossMdEP @caffara @MichalGal2 @DigitalEU The market share of non-EU #cloud providers is growing in 🇪🇺. item.title: #en @ 1466733207135690752
item.description: #RIOSuite is a research prototype #AI #VR dedicated to: (1) #datainterpretation from #sensors, #socialmedia and #opendata for #situationawareness, (2) #response planing for collaborative tasking (3) #orchestration of the response schema, and (4) #monitoring and #anticipation. https://t.co/QR52fPjaqt

item.title: #en @ 1466732254374334466
item.description: @kakape Need to say more specifically what we can & should do. So pls add to the list: - 3x vax asap as many as possible - quarantine vaccinated contacts - tracking (SGTF), genomic surveillance, open data - vax+tests for gatherings - get ready to produce&rollout updated vaccines

item.title: #en @ 1466706171012673537
item.description:
I expect more from @mpklang.
This data is readily accessible on the MoH GitHub, with latest utilisation displayed transparently on COVIDNOW.
If common public, no problem - it's MoH duty. I have higher standards for MPs.
Open data is a 2 way street. Don't be lazy. https://t.co/iBuZ2dbLQ8

item.description:
震源深さが20km、富士山のマグマだまりも20kmということで大騒ぎしてる人がいますが、水平距離で30km以上離れてるし、深部低周波地震も増えてない。慌てずに。
活火山富士山がわかる本｜静岡大学 防災総合センター https://t.co/qIz3qfegF7
